content: introducing our cute little hedgehog pincushion make one for a fellow crafter or even one for yourself us crocheters are always making things for other people especially those of us who specialise in amigurumi so it s really nice to have something functional to crochet for yourself you can also crochet this as a hedgehog stuffed toy amigurumi for the kid in your life plus the legs are designed to allow it to stand so it would make a really cute desk buddy too using dk yarn and a 2 75mm crochet hook this hedgehog is approximately 4 inches long and takes about an hour and a half to crochet you can use any yarn with the relevant hook but the sizing may vary this listing is for the ads-free print-friendly pdf pattern however you can find the pattern for free on the blog at https //chaicoffeecrochet com/crochet-hedgehog/
